document_data.name: Lysander Il'Argad
document_data.home: [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]], [[Earthspur Mountains]]{{Cite adventurers league/Eye of the Tempest|33}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Lysander Il'Argad''' was an individual at the [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]] in the late 15th century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Lysander was bored and inquisitive. He did not enjoy the spartan rooms of the monastery and the lack of excitement found in the place.
document_data.History: Lysander was one of the guests at the monastery in [[1491 DR]]. His job was to use the monastery's libraries to research various subjects for some [[Damaran]] nobles.
